column2: This job opening has been viewed  554  times  About this job   MOC Controller   Position:     The Maintenance Controller reports to MOC Manager. He/she will monitor the operation and direct actions to ensure the aircraft safety is maintained. Track and control aircraft defects and formulate plans to ensure timely rectification and lowest possible numbers of deferred defects are carried forward. Provide 24 hour technical assistance and direction to flight crew and Engineers system wide. Identify recurring defects and trends and construct rectification plans for rectification. Formulate and institute plans for service recovery to avoid technical delays. Represent Maintenance support interests with other departments and aircraft manufacturers.  Salary & Benefits:    We offer our employee\\\'s competitive remuneration package.  Experience and Qualifications:       Served an apprenticeship with an airline/approved organisation or have received equivalent formal training.    A minimum of  5 years experience  of which at least  2 years as a MOC Controller.      Minimum License Requirements ATR 42/72-500 or similar aircraft issued by DGCA-India with validity and current.    Thorough job knowledge covering all aspects of aircraft maintenance practices and procedures.     Must be fully familiar with legislative and legal matters relating to the safe and airworthy operation and maintenance of aircraft to international standards.    Fluency in English Language, reading/writing/conversing.   Age must be less than 50 years.
